test.name: Sc01: Warning message when fill forbidden data

kw.name: Given User open "Find owners" menu
kw.doc: Open website Click button "Find owners" on navigation bar Wait until search owner form displays

kw.name: User open petclinic website
kw.doc: Open and wait until homepage display

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: When User create owner first name:"toto", last name:"paul", adress:"une rue", city:"todo", telephone: "toto"
kw.sourcename: User create owner first name:"${firstname}", last name:"${lastname}", adress:"${address}", city:"${city}", telephone: "${telephone}"
kw.doc: Set global variables for owner information Enter info into form and click button "Add owner"

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: User click button Add owner
kw.doc: Click button "Add owner"

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: User input firstname
kw.doc: Enter firstname if value is not empty

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: User input lastname
kw.doc: Enter lastname if value is not empty

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: User input address
kw.doc: Enter address if value is not empty

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'une rue' into text field 'id=address'.

kw.name: User input city
kw.doc: Enter city if value is not empty

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: User input telephone
kw.doc: Enter telephone if value is not empty

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: User click button Create owner
kw.doc: Click button "Add owner"

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then A warning message display "numeric value out of bounds (<10 digits>.<0 digits> expected)"
kw.doc: Verify warning message as expected message

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'css=span.help-inline' contains exact text 'numeric value out of bounds (<10 digits>.<0 digits> expected)'.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

kw.name: User click button Create owner
kw.doc: Click button "Add owner"

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Table Owner information should displays
kw.doc: Verify "Owner Information" table displays

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: And Name should same as Firstname and Lastname filled in previous screen
kw.doc: Verify "Name" field corresponds to Firstname and Lastname

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//th[text()='Name']/following::b' contains exact text 'toto paul'.

kw.name: And Address should same as Address filled in previous screen
kw.doc: Verify "Address" field corresponds to Address

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//th[text()='Address']/following::td[1]' contains exact text 'une rue'.

kw.name: And City should same as City filled in previous screen
kw.doc: Verify "City" field corresponds to City

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: And Telephone should same as Telephone filled in previous screen
kw.doc: Verify "Telephone" field corresponds to Telephone

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
